short.am,ar,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,: Stay safe when browsing the Internet by getting information about the reliability of sites in real time.
short.bg: Бъдете в безопасност, когато сърфирате в интернет, като получавате информация за надеждността на сайтовете в реално време.
short.bn: রিয়েল টাইমে সাইটের নির্ভরযোগ্যতা সম্পর্কে তথ্য পেয়ে ইন্টারনেট ব্রাউজ করার সময় সুরক্ষিত থাকুন।
short.cs: Chraňte se při procházení Internetu získáváním informací o spolehlivosti stránek v reálném čase.
short.da: Vær sikker, når du surfer på Internettet ved at få oplysninger om websteds pålidelighed i realtid.
short.de: Bleiben Sie beim Surfen im Internet sicher, indem Sie in Echtzeit Informationen über die Zuverlässigkeit von Websites abrufen.
short.el: Μείνετε ασφαλείς κατά την περιήγηση στο Διαδίκτυο λαμβάνοντας πληροφορίες σχετικά με την αξιοπιστία των ιστότοπων σε πραγματικό…
short.es: Manténgase seguro al navegar por Internet al obtener información sobre la confiabilidad de los sitios en tiempo real.
short.fi: Pysy turvassa selatessasi Internetiä hankkimalla tietoja sivustojen luotettavuudesta reaaliajassa.
short.fil: Manatiling ligtas kapag nagba-browse sa Internet sa pamamagitan ng pagkuha ng impormasyon tungkol sa pagiging maaasahan ng mga site…
short.fr: Restez en sécurité lorsque vous naviguez sur Internet en obtenant des informations sur la fiabilité des sites en temps réel.
short.hi: वास्तविक समय में साइटों की विश्वसनीयता के बारे में जानकारी प्राप्त करके इंटरनेट ब्राउज़ करते समय सुरक्षित रहें।
short.hu: Legyen biztonságban az internet böngészése során, ha valós időben szerez információkat a webhelyek megbízhatóságáról.
short.id: Tetap aman saat menjelajah Internet dengan mendapatkan informasi tentang keandalan situs secara real time.
short.it: Stai al sicuro durante la navigazione in Internet ottenendo informazioni sull'affidabilità dei siti in tempo reale.
short.ja: サイトの信頼性に関する情報をリアルタイムで取得して、インターネットを閲覧するときの安全を確保してください。
short.ko: 사이트의 신뢰성에 대한 정보를 실시간으로 받아 인터넷을 검색할 때 안전을 유지하십시오.
short.nl: Blijf veilig tijdens het surfen op internet door in realtime informatie te krijgen over de betrouwbaarheid van sites.
short.no: Hold deg trygg når du surfer på Internett ved å få informasjon om påliteligheten til nettsteder i sanntid.
short.pl: Zachowaj bezpieczeństwo podczas przeglądania Internetu, uzyskując informacje o niezawodności witryn w czasie rzeczywistym.
short.pt_PT: Fique seguro ao navegar na Internet, obtendo informações sobre a confiabilidade dos sites em tempo real.
short.ro: Rămâneți în siguranță când navigați pe Internet obținând informații despre fiabilitatea site-urilor în timp real.
short.ru: Будьте в безопасности при просмотре Интернета, получив информацию о надежности сайтов в режиме реального времени.
short.sl: Zostaňte v bezpečí pri prehľadávaní Internetu získaním informácií o spoľahlivosti stránok v reálnom čase.
short.sr: Будите сигурни приликом прегледавања Интернета тако што ћете у стварном времену добити информације о поузданости веб локација.
short.sv: Håll dig säker när du surfar på Internet genom att få information om webbplatsernas tillförlitlighet i realtid.
short.tr: Sitelerin güvenilirliği hakkında gerçek zamanlı bilgi alarak internette gezinirken güvende kalın.
short.vi: Giữ an toàn khi duyệt Internet bằng cách nhận thông tin về độ tin cậy của các trang web trong thời gian thực.
short.zh_CN: 通过实时获取有关站点可靠性的信息，在浏览 Internet 时保持安全。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Forewarned is forearmed

✔ Defend yourself and your family from online scammers.
✔ Get information about the safety level of the website in real time.
✔ Enter your card details only on certified websites.


Web Risk Info helps you to stay safe on the Internet. This extension checks visiting websites and warns you in real time in danger.
Smileys in your browser warn you immediately in danger:

● Red face means alarm, urgent evacuation!
● Yellow smiley means the world is compelling but be careful.
● Green face means you are safe and the situation is safely!

You will be the most informed on the risks of visiting any site by choosing Web Risk Info.
Web Risk Info provides an overall risk assessment in real time demonstrating danger level due to automatic analysis of the ratings of the websites in the most popular independent sources.

Because of imperfect algorithms similar extensions, can suddenly block access to your favourite sites. In contrast to them Web Risk Info only informs and provides the user with absolute free choice.

A big bonus of this small extension is rapid working with low RAM and CPU usage!



This extension uses permissions that produce the following browser messages to perform necessary functions within the extension:

● “Read and change all your data on the websites you visit”
Shown for permissions needed for detecting online risks on all types of pages you browse.

● “Read your browsing history”
Shown for permissions needed for displaying site safety rating information reliably during tab manipulations

● “Display notifications”
Shown for permissions needed for showing important  alerts


This extension also uses permissions that are not displayed in browser for performing certain functions within the extension:

● “webRequest” and “webRequestBlocking” permissions
Needed for accessing low-level data when browsing websites to help recognize certain threats.

● "tabs" permissions
Needed for displaying site safety rating information during tab manipulations


Please read the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use before using Web Risk Info
Privacy Policy: https://webrisk.info/privacy
Terms of Use: https://webrisk.info/terms
